meanings: atrocity, revilement, abusive language, ―하다 revile, abuse, rave, rail(against)

vlive.korean: [최후의 발악] 내가 형한테 왔으면 좋겠어, 갔으면 좋겠어? [One last try] Do you want me to come or go? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.26 SSS #2 (SVT SECRET SANTA #2)

examples.korean: The regime is now in its death throes. 발음듣기 그 정권은 지금 최후의 발악을 하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The regime is now in its death throes. 발음

examples.korean: I heard sounds of a desperate struggle in the next room. 발음듣기 옆방에서 발악을 하며 몸부림을 치는 소리가 들렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I heard sounds of a desperate struggle in the next room. 발음

examples.korean: Wade tried his best to give them the game. 발음듣기 Wade는 게임을 지려고 발악을 했어. DARAKWON
examples.english: Wade tried his best to give them the game. 발음

examples.korean: They are trying their hardest to lose this game. 발음듣기 이 경기를 지려고 발악을 하고 있어. DARAKWON
examples.english: They are trying their hardest to lose this game. 발음

examples.korean: Let him do his worst. 발음듣기 녀석 발악을 해 보라지. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Let him do his worst. 발음
